identity.mission: Create a premium, trustworthy, and high-conversion re-commerce platform for Patna.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix fintech precision with consumer tech warmth.
Emotion First: Every interaction builds trust and excitement.
Content is King: Clear, jargon-free language for selling phones.
Zoom In: High-quality visuals of devices.
Negative Space: Generous padding to reduce cognitive load.
Contrast: High contrast for readability and impact.

hero.style: Split layout with large typography on left, 3D/Image visual on right.
elements: H1: 'Sell Your Old Phone Instantly in Patna'
Subtext: 'Get the best price for your used smartphone in 60 seconds. Free pickup, instant cash.'
Visual: High-quality smartphone image floating or in hand.
Progress Bar: Top of screen, animated.
Options: Large clickable cards with icons.

price_reveal.style: Celebratory animation with ticker for price.
elements: Price: Large, bold, counting up animation.
Breakdown: Accordion for price deduction details.

cards.style: Glassmorphism or solid dark with subtle border.

transitions.page: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
transitions.stagger: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
